mapper.select: SELECT /* org.bplte.core.api.domain.post.mapper.PostMapper.selectPostListCount */ COUNT(*) FROM TBL_POST A WHERE A.DEL_YN = 'N'

SELECT /* org.bplte.core.api.domain.post.mapper.PostMapper.selectPostList */ A.POST_NUMBER AS postNumber , A.OWNER_USER_ID AS ownerUserId , A.TITLE AS title , DATE_FORMAT(A.REG_DT, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS regDt , A.RGTR_ID AS rgtrId , B.USER_NAME AS rgtrName , CONCAT(B.USER_NAME, '(', A.RGTR_ID, ')') AS rgtrInfo , DATE_FORMAT(A.MDFCN_DT, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS mdfcnDt , A.MDFR_ID AS mdfrId , C.USER_NAME AS mdfrName , CONCAT(C.USER_NAME, '(', A.MDFR_ID, ')') AS mdfrInfo FROM TBL_POST A LEFT OUTER JOIN TBL_USER B ON B.USER_ID = A.RGTR_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN TBL_USER C ON C.USER_ID = A.MDFR_ID WHERE A.DEL_YN = 'N' LIMIT ${limit} OFFSET ${offset}
